Marlow's Listener not having to wait until you can decently interrupt

Poke in the eye with a sharp stick

04 May 2015

If the intent is to insult, then is it really such a shock that people could feel insulted?

Vox

Brave New World

04 May 2015

Marlow has been blogging going on a score years, first on an SGI Indy and a fractional T-1, then a virtual server. Such tedious overhead. Aristophenes be damned! Onto the cloud!

It can never be just one lie

04 Jan 2015

unless you have an indefinitely extensible repertoire of ways to use your candidate belief (if that is what it is) in different contexts, it is not a belief in any remotely recognizable sense.

Daniel Dennett, Intuition Pumps and Other Tools for Thinking
